name: People
description: People domain covers the skills and activities associated with effectively leading a project team. This includes topics such as conflict management, team building, negotiation, emotional intelligence, and virtual teams.

tasks.name: Manage Conflict
tasks.description: Conflict management involves resolving disagreements to prevent escalation and maintain positive team dynamics. Understand the different conflict resolution styles and when to apply each.

tasks.name: Lead Team
tasks.description: Leading a team involves setting direction, inspiring team members, and creating an environment where everyone can contribute their best work.

tasks.name: Support Team Performance
tasks.description: Supporting team performance involves removing obstacles, providing resources, and creating conditions for the team to succeed.

tasks.name: Empower Team Members and Stakeholders
tasks.description: Empowerment involves giving team members and stakeholders the authority, autonomy, and resources they need to make decisions and take action.

tasks.name: Ensure Team Members/Stakeholders are Adequately Trained
tasks.description: Training involves identifying skill gaps and ensuring team members and stakeholders have the knowledge and skills needed to succeed.

tasks.name: Build a Team
tasks.description: Team building involves creating a cohesive group that works together effectively to achieve project goals.

tasks.name: Address and Remove Impediments, Obstacles, and Blockers
tasks.description: Addressing impediments involves identifying and removing anything that prevents the team from working effectively.

tasks.name: Negotiate
tasks.description: Negotiation involves reaching agreements through discussion and compromise while maintaining positive relationships.

tasks.name: Collaborate with Stakeholders
tasks.description: Collaboration involves working closely with stakeholders to ensure their needs are met and they remain engaged throughout the project.

tasks.name: Lead a Virtual Team
tasks.description: Leading virtual teams involves managing team members who are geographically dispersed and may work across different time zones and cultures.

tasks.name: Define Ground Rules
tasks.description: Ground rules are the guidelines that establish acceptable behavior and working agreements for the team.

tasks.name: Manage Emotional Intelligence
tasks.description: Emotional intelligence involves understanding and managing your own emotions and those of others to build better working relationships.

name: Process
description: Process domain covers the technical and management activities associated with effectively executing a project. This includes topics such as scope management, schedule management, cost management, quality management, and risk management.

tasks.name: Execute Communication with Stakeholders
tasks.description: Communication execution involves ensuring timely and appropriate generation, collection, dissemination, storage, and ultimate disposition of project information.

tasks.name: Manage Scope
tasks.description: Scope management involves ensuring the project includes all the work required, and only the work required, to complete the project successfully.

tasks.name: Schedule Management
tasks.description: Schedule management involves planning, executing, and controlling the project timeline to ensure timely completion.

tasks.name: Manage Budget and Costs
tasks.description: Budget and cost management involves planning, estimating, budgeting, financing, funding, managing, and controlling costs.

tasks.name: Manage Quality
tasks.description: Quality management involves ensuring the project will satisfy the needs for which it was undertaken.

tasks.name: Manage Resources
tasks.description: Resource management involves identifying, acquiring, and managing the resources needed for project completion.

tasks.name: Manage Procurement
tasks.description: Procurement management involves buying or acquiring products, services, or results from outside the project team.

tasks.name: Manage Changes in a Project
tasks.description: Change management involves controlling and documenting changes to project baselines.

tasks.name: Manage Project Knowledge
tasks.description: Knowledge management involves using existing knowledge and creating new knowledge to achieve project objectives.

tasks.name: Plan and Manage Project/Project Deliverables
tasks.description: Deliverable management involves defining, creating, and ensuring quality of project outputs.

tasks.name: Assess and Manage Project and Product Risks
tasks.description: Risk management involves identifying, analyzing, and responding to risk factors throughout the project life cycle.

tasks.name: Manage Project Work
tasks.description: Project work management involves directing and executing the planned project activities.

tasks.name: Ensure Accountability
tasks.description: Accountability involves ensuring team members take ownership of their responsibilities and deliver on commitments.

tasks.name: Manage Project Dependencies
tasks.description: Dependency management involves identifying and managing relationships between tasks, resources, and stakeholders.

tasks.name: Manage Project Transitions
tasks.description: Transition management involves ensuring smooth handoffs between project phases and to operations.

tasks.name: Plan Project Scope
tasks.description: Scope planning involves defining what is included in and excluded from the project.

tasks.name: Plan Project Schedule
tasks.description: Schedule planning involves developing the timeline for project completion.

tasks.name: Plan Project Budget and Costs
tasks.description: Budget planning involves estimating costs and establishing the project budget.

tasks.name: Plan Management of Quality
tasks.description: Quality planning involves identifying quality standards and requirements for the project and its deliverables.

tasks.name: Plan Resources for the Project
tasks.description: Resource planning involves identifying and acquiring the resources needed for project completion.

tasks.name: Plan Procurement
tasks.description: Procurement planning involves determining what to procure, when, and how.

tasks.name: Plan for Project Improvements
tasks.description: Improvement planning involves identifying opportunities to enhance project performance.

tasks.name: Plan Stakeholder Engagement
tasks.description: Stakeholder engagement planning involves developing strategies to effectively engage stakeholders.

name: Business Environment
description: Business Environment domain covers the understanding of the project's organizational context and ensuring alignment with business goals and strategy. This includes topics such as compliance, governance, organizational structure, and business value.

tasks.name: Define and Establish Project Governance
tasks.description: Project governance establishes the framework, functions, and processes that guide project management activities to create a unique product, service, or result to meet organizational goals.

tasks.name: Determine Project Feasibility
tasks.description: Feasibility assessment involves evaluating whether a project is viable and worth pursuing based on technical, economic, legal, operational, and scheduling factors.

tasks.name: Determine and Champion Project Business Value
tasks.description: Business value determination involves identifying and articulating the value the project will deliver to the organization.

tasks.name: Analyze and Document External Business Environment Factors
tasks.description: External environment analysis involves understanding factors outside the organization that may affect the project.

tasks.name: Analyze and Document Internal Business Environment Factors
tasks.description: Internal environment analysis involves understanding factors within the organization that may affect the project.

tasks.name: Evaluate and Address Organizational Culture
tasks.description: Culture evaluation involves understanding how organizational culture affects the project and adapting approaches accordingly.

tasks.name: Identify and Leverage Key Organizational Resources
tasks.description: Resource identification involves finding and utilizing the organization's assets to support the project.

tasks.name: Evaluate and Align with Project Compliance Requirements
tasks.description: Compliance management involves ensuring the project meets all legal, regulatory, and contractual requirements.

tasks.name: Evaluate and Support Organizational Change Management
tasks.description: Change management evaluation involves understanding and supporting organizational change initiatives related to the project.

tasks.name: Evaluate Continuous Support and Operations
tasks.description: Operations evaluation involves planning for how project deliverables will be supported and maintained after project completion.

tasks.name: Maintain Awareness of Trends in the Industry and Marketplace
tasks.description: Trend awareness involves staying informed about industry developments that may affect the project.

tasks.name: Consider ESG (Environmental, Social, and Governance) Factors
tasks.description: ESG consideration involves integrating environmental, social, and governance factors into project decisions.

tasks.name: Consider AI and Emerging Technology
tasks.description: Technology consideration involves evaluating how AI and emerging technologies can support or impact the project.
